title: Pamphlet, The Push Pin Almanack / April Fool's Issue / March-April 1955 / No. 15, March–April 1955
title_raw: The Push Pin Almanack / April Fool's Issue / March-April 1955 / No. 15
medium:
cover: offset lithography in black on heavy orange laid paper
folio pages: photo offset lithography in black with red on heavy yellow-cream wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted on back cover, publication information: cover: photo offset lithography by Alan Offset Photography Co., paper stock by Baldwin Paper Co., Inc., Linweave, "Tabasco Della Robia," Basis 160lb.; inside folios: paper by Baldwin Paper Co., Inc., Linweave, 'Old Ivory Early American," Basis 80lb.; design by Push Pin Studios
dimensions:
21.0 x 9.5 cm (8 1/4 x 3 3/4 in. )(cover, closed)
20.5 x 18.4 cm (8 1/16 x 7 1/4 in.)(each folio, open)
description: Small vertical pamphlet printed in black with touches of red on inner pages; 4 folios (16 pages), bound down center with three staples; on cover at top in vertical rectangle: The / Push Pin / Almanack / Published every / other month / for the pleasure and / edification of all; personification of a push pin with woman's face at center of rectangle.  On title page at top: The Push Pin / Almanack / Being the choicest morsels / of essential information / gathered for those persons / in the graphic arts.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pamphlet, The Push Pin Almanack / April Fool's Issue / March-April 1955 / No. 15, March–April 1955. cover: offset lithography in black on heavy orange laid paper
folio pages: photo offset lithography in black with red on heavy yellow-cream wove paper. Gift of Seymour Chwast. 1998-74-2.
